summary: THE LATCH ON THE PASSENGER SIDE DOOR WILL NOT FUNCTION, CAUSING THE DOOR TO FLY OPEN WHEN DRIVING THE VEHICLE. EVEN WHEN CLOSED AND LOCKED, WHEN YOU OPEN THE DRIVERS SIDE DOOR, THE DOOR UNLOCKS AN DOOR OPENS. IT IS CURRENTLY AT FORD TO BE FIXED. THERE HAS BEEN PREVIOUS RECALLS ON THE 2013 FUSION, AND THIS CAR IS NOT LISTED AS A RECALL??? SEEMS LIKE THE SAME PROBLEM TO ME, AND IT IS COSTLY TO FIX!  CURRENTLY AT THE FORD DEALERSHIP IN DELAWARE.
